summary: Changes Argis, the Markarth Housecarl, to Bugdul, a Two-Handed Orc Warrior as part of the Housecarl Requip Project
descriptionHtml:
The HRP is ago and I'm changing all Housecarls aside from Rayya to add diversity to the Housecarls encountered in Skyrim. This time Argis has undergone a full makeover and has changed into Bugdul, an Orcish warrior who now owes allegiance to the Dragonborn. As always, if you think there is room for improvement, feel free to say so and if you don't like it at all, don't download it.

Details: Changes Argis the Bulwark from a Nord to an Orc, changes his name to Bugdul the Bulwark and replaces the standard Housecarl Outfit with a helmetless Orcish Armor Outfit and an Orcish Greatsword. If you just want a Two-Handed Argis, download the optional file, which leaves his race and face intact but provides him with a Dwarven Outfit.

Requirements: None.

Bugs: The Grey Face Bug is likely to occur when activating this mod after first encountering the Housecarl. So either use this on a save file in which you haven't encountered the affected NPC, or hope a more experienced modder comes up with a solution.

Installation: Standard procedure: download and drop the files in the Data folder.

Load order: as far down as possible, especially if you have mods running that alter Argis.
author: pepertje
